attributes.action: Remove Cat Deeley from our screens forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cat Deeley has pleased us all by defecting to the US. 

She is now being beamed back to our shores on American Idol. Cat has neither the personality, nor charm, to carry off the show, which was previously enjoyable.

Cat is apparantly also in talks to host X-Factor. Please spare us.

Cat is perfect for an American audience. Need we say more. So please spare the UK audience this unfortunate turn of events, which threatens to destroy family entertainment as we know it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
